page.title: 03TEN ROTHLEY INDUSTRIES
page.content: A surprising variety of small firms: { Marwins:}Cutting tool makers with 100 employees, 8 of which are local. { F.Sleath & Sons:}Building firm - medium scale repair and maintenance.It has 92 employees(20 live in Rothley). { Mountley Engineering:}Makers of brake cylinders for trucks,parts for heavy duty pumps.13 employees;2 local.(plus ghost from former undertakers). { Silicon Express:}Retailers of computers and equipment.25 Employees: 2 local.(Firm fully computerised) { Checkland Kindleyside:}Designers of Advertising Aids.With 18 employees,(2 local.){Brookmans Engineering: (37,6 {local)}Woodworking machines morticers ,borers etc. {Blowers:}Knitwear-30 workers-6 local,{ +80 outworkers{.Central Ductwork Regal {Star},also small Electrical,Haulage, and Undertakers and Carpenters.
